to desing a Diseñado AWP FOR year 2016 To design Conceptual model for SPAN to condcut METT.Management Effectiveness Tracking Tool (METT). ito conduct PABAT in protected areas To conduct Evaluacion ambiental estrategica To stablish a gender maestriming and intercultural policy in programs and projects to stablish technical steering comite to apply 2 Reserves of Biosphere one in Island and second in continent

description.narrative: A Policy framework and Strategy for the management of PAs is developed
Change in amount of FONAMA and FONADEFO financial disbursements

comment.narrative: FONAMA and FONADEFO are nonfunctional
By 2012 FONAMA and FONADEFO are dispersing 50 of recurrent and operational costs of NSPA and biodiversity management including grants to Guinean conservation NGOs
At this point you are waiting for decisions at the level of the Government of the Republic of Equatorial Guinea referred to in the recommendations drawn up by the management of the project team

description.narrative: Number of revised policies and laws enactedadopted

comment.narrative:
EG National Biodiversity Policy framework is nonfunctional
Environmental sector laws are unclear and contradictory
No environmental sector coordinating body exists
EGs 20year national development plan is not carbon neutral

By 2011 a revised National Biodiversity Policy enacted that supports a role for NGOs and community organizations in biodiversity management
By 2012 a new environmental sector law clearly defines complementary roles and responsibilities for MdePyMA MdeAyB and INDEFOR
By 2011 an environmental sector coordinating body created staffed and budgeted
By 2012 EGs 20year national development plan revised to be carbon neutral

The project team reviewed all laws relating to environmental forestry and protected areas
The project team has carried out a study and has given the necessary recommendations to address the problem of scattered and contradictory legislation
the document produced by the project team has been high at the level of the Council of Ministers for its consideration in the month of June 2015

comment.narrative: No organized profitable ecotourism exists based on Bioko Islands rare and endangered primates and birds

description.narrative: Gazetting of the Bioko Forest Corridor

comment.narrative: The critical ecological transect between the Caldera de Luba and Pico Basilé and the wild animals moving between the two are unprotected unmanaged and vulnerable to forest conversion
By 2012 the Bioko Forest Corridor is gazetted

title.narrative: "Apoyo a la Agencia Nacional Guinea Ecuatorial 2020 en la implementación del Plan Nacional de Desarrollo Económico y Social"
"Apoyo al Programa Nacional de Planificación e implementación del Plan Horizonte 2020"

description.narrative: El proyecto trata de apoyar al Ministerio de Economia, Planificacion e Inversiones Públicas en la implementacion y seguimiento del PNDES y cuestiones transversales de desarrollo.
independent political entity
capital of a political entity

Reforzar las capacidades técnicas de los funcionarios de la Dirección General de Planificación y Programación y reforzar las capacidades institucionales de la Agencia Guinea Ecuatorial Horizonte 2020.

comment.narrative: Capacidades insuficientes de las instituciones encargadas del seguimiento de los ODM y el Plan Horizonte 2020.

- Reforzar las capacidades de seguimiento de los ODM y el PDES Horizonte 2020. - Seguimiento de los ODM asegurado para la evaluación en 2015. - Revisión del marco legal de Ministerio, Dirección General de Planificación, reactualizado el marco legal de las células sectoriales de planificación (CSP). - Capacitar el personal de la Agencia Guinea Ecuatorial Horizonte 2020, DGPP.

- Reforzadas las capacidades técnicas del personal de la dirección general de Estadísticas mediante talleres de capacitación sobre la implementación del plan nacional de desarrollo Económico y Social al Horizonte 2020 - Elaborado con éxito el Informe Nacional de los ODM - Revisado el Marco legal del Ministerio
